title: 8 Essential Tips for Designers Crafting Branded Templates in Figma Buzz

paragraphs.content: Figma Buzz empowers designers to build flexible, brand-controlled templates that enable marketing teams to create consistent assets like social media posts and ads without starting from scratch.Key practices include using auto layout to maintain spacing as content changes and separating text layers for seamless bulk creation from CSV or XLSX files.Locking strategic elements such as logos ensures brand standards while allowing edits to text and images via the Edit Content panel.

sections.title: Mastering Auto Layout and Text Layer Strategies in Buzz Templates

paragraphs.content: Auto layout forms the backbone of responsive designs in Figma Buzz, ensuring buttons, text boxes, and images adjust dynamically without disrupting alignment during content updates.Designers should separate text layers for each unique input, especially varying font styles, to support Bulk Create functionality where data fields map directly to layers.This modularity prevents formatting breaks when generating multiple assets at once.

sections.title: Leveraging Component Variants and User Testing for Scalable Assets

paragraphs.content: Component variants consolidate options like multi-color illustrations or layout orientations into single sets, accessible via Swap Content in Buzz.Designers can paste Figma Design assets into Buzz, where properties for layout, color, or size automatically enable dynamic edits.This connection to design systems supports variations for platforms like Instagram or LinkedIn without separate templates.
